name: Sacrifice
Lore: 'Jabba''s minions could be expected to be sacrificed to save the Hutt, to destroy one of the Hutts enemies or to provide the Hutt and his minions with a good laugh.',
Text: 'Reduce your battle damage by 5 by losing from hand a starship, vehicle or character. OR If your character''s forfeit was just reduced to 0, restore it to normal. (Immune to Sense.)',
